fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Attack a player, you will delete their role, players die when they have their role deleted.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are completely immune to any negative effects from visiting, attacking or killing someone.
- If a town role has Basic defense or higher, you will make them lose if you delete their role, even if town wins.
- If you and a town role with defense is alive you will prevent the game from ending.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Town goal and kill all town roles with defense.
